text.autoconfig.quickstack.title: QuickStack Configuration!
text.autoconfig.quickstack.title.name: General
text.autoconfig.quickstack.option.allowH: Denotes whether items in the hotbar should be quick stacked.
text.autoconfig.quickstack.option.contai: Denotes the distance (in blocks) to search for containers when quick stacking.
Denotes the duration (in seconds) for which deposited containers are highlighted after being quick stacked.
